description: Absolute orientation sensor. Arduino library for the BNO055 breakout (https://learn.adafruit.com/adafruit-bno055-absolute-orientation-sensor/). Wraps Adafruit Unified BNO055 Driver (https://github.com/adafruit/Adafruit_BNO055).
name: bno055-aos

@/abs-orient-sensor.description: Continuously describes orientation using Euler angles (heading/yaw, pitch and roll).

B1xUpXhF7V.description: Orientation in Y-axis (roll) in degrees. -90° to +90° (increasing with increasing inclination).
B1xUpXhF7V.label: Y

H1H6Wg9XE.description: System calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
H1H6Wg9XE.label: SYS

HkW8a73Y7V.description: Orientation in Z-axis (pitch) in degrees. +180° to -180°  (turning clockwise decreases values).
HkW8a73Y7V.label: Z

HybUMnFmN.description: Time (seconds) to wait between completing one reading and initiating another.
HybUMnFmN.label: WAIT

S1caZx9XE.description: Gyroscope calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
S1caZx9XE.label: GYRO

SJXHX3KXV.description: I²C address of the bno055. Default is 28h. If ADR pin of Adafruit breakout board is set high (connected to 3V), then the I²C address becomes 29h.
SJXHX3KXV.label: ADDRESS

Sks6bg5mV.description: Accelerometer calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
Sks6bg5mV.label: ACC

Sy3abgq74.description: Magnetometer calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
Sy3abgq74.label: MAG

SyU6QhK7N.description: Orientation in X-axis (heading/yaw) in degrees. 0° to 360° (turning clockwise increases values).
SyU6QhK7N.label: X

r1mR7ht7V.description: Pulses after each read of sensor.
r1mR7ht7V.label: OK

ryLWm3tXN.description: User defined unique ID for this device.
ryLWm3tXN.label: ID

HkecNeM7V.description: User defined unique ID for this device.
HkecNeM7V.label: ID

SkjIclMQV.description: I²C address of the bno055. Default is 28h. If ADR pin of Adafruit breakout board is set high (connected to 3V), then the I²C address becomes 29h.
SkjIclMQV.label: ADDRESS

@/example-query-chip-revision-numbers.description: Example patch for reading the chip revision numbers of the bno055 absolute orientation sensor.

@/example-read-raw-data.description: Example demonstrating the reading of raw data from the sensor.

@/example-test-sensor.description: Patch for testing bno055 device using abs-orient-sensor node.

@/example-test-sensor-quaternion.description: Patch for testing bno055 device using abs-orient-sensor-quaternion node.

@/example-text-lcd-16x2-i2c.description: Example to show how output from the bno055 absolute orientation sensor can be displayed on a text LCD screen.  The LCD screen will display heading/yaw (X), roll (Y), pitch (Z) and calibration status of system (C).

S1n3_7-QV.description: Trigger for initialization. Default is to initialize on boot.
S1n3_7-QV.label: INIT

@/read-acceleration.description: Reads acceleration in each of the three axes.

@/read-angular-velocity.description: Reads angular velocity in each of the three axes.

BkfKRfGFm4.description: Angular velocity in X-axis (degrees per second).
BkfKRfGFm4.label: X

SkmF0fzK74.description: Angular velocity in Y-axis (degrees per second).
SkmF0fzK74.label: Y

ry4YRGzF7N.description: Angular velocity in Z-axis (degrees per second).
ry4YRGzF7N.label: Z

@/read-calibration.description: Reads calibration status of the system and three sensors.

B1cGATY7N.description: Magnetometer calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
B1cGATY7N.label: MAG

H1t4FuvQ4.description: Pulses on read of calibration data.
H1t4FuvQ4.label: DONE

HJGXb_DQV.description: System calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
HJGXb_DQV.label: SYS

S1dMApKm4.description: Gyroscope calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
S1dMApKm4.label: GYRO

rktzCTKX4.description: Accelerometer calibration on a scale of 0-3. 0 = uncalibrated; 3= fully calibrated.
rktzCTKX4.label: ACC

@/read-gravitational-acceleration.description: Reads gravitational acceleration (accleration minus any movement) in each of the three axes.

BJ7vTfGKQN.description: Gravitational acceleration (acceleration minus any movement) in the Y-axis (m/s²).
BJ7vTfGKQN.label: Y

Skfv6GzKXN.description: Gravitational acceleration (acceleration minus any movement) in the X-axis (m/s²).
Skfv6GzKXN.label: X

ryEvpMGY7E.description: Gravitational acceleration (acceleration minus any movement) in the Z-axis (m/s²).
ryEvpMGY7E.label: Z

@/read-linear-acceleration.description: Reads linear acceleration (acceleration minus gravity) in each of the three axes.

BkVhpffYXE.description: Linear acceleration (acceleration minus gravity) in the Z-axis (m/s²).
BkVhpffYXE.label: Z

ByM3pMGtQE.description: Linear acceleration (acceleration minus gravity) in the X-axis (m/s²).
ByM3pMGtQE.label: X

SyXnazMKXV.description: Linear acceleration (acceleration minus gravity) in the Y-axis (m/s²).
SyXnazMKXV.label: Y

@/read-magnetic-field-strength.description: Reads magnetic field strength in each of the three axes.

B17JCMGF7V.description: Magnetic field strength in Y-axis (micro Tesla).
B17JCMGF7V.label: Y

S141AGfYmV.description: Magnetic field strength in Z-axis (micro Tesla).
S141AGfYmV.label: Z

ryf1RGMtmN.description: Magnetic field strength in X-axis (micro Tesla).
ryf1RGMtmN.label: X

@/read-orientation.description: Reads orientation in Euler angles (heading/yaw, pitch and roll).

HJy0IzzmN.description: Orientation in Y-axis (roll) in degrees. -90° to +90° (increasing with increasing inclination).
HJy0IzzmN.label: Y

HJyJPfGQE.description: Orientation in Z-axis (pitch) in degrees. +180° to -180°  (turning clockwise decreases values).
HJyJPfGQE.label: Z

Hks3UGG74.description: Orientation in X-axis (heading/yaw) in degrees. 0° to 360° (turning clockwise increases values).
Hks3UGG74.label: X

@/read-rev-info.description: Read chip revision numbers of the bno055 absolute orientation sensor.

BJQG0Mv7N.label: STAT

S1YmAzPmV.description: Self-test results: bit 0 = accelerometer self-test; bit 1 = magnetometer self-test; bit 2 = gyroscope self-test; bit 3 = MCU self-test. 0Fh = all good!
S1YmAzPmV.label: TEST

SkrVRMPXN.label: SERR

@/read-temp.description: Returns the current ambient temperature in degrees celsius.

r1qqEvdQV.description: Current ambient temperature in degrees celsius.
r1qqEvdQV.label: TEMP

H16KdoPN4.content: User-LED is the minus sign when the number displayed by LED-digits is negative.

SJtrtsDNV.content: User-LED indicates that a minimum system calibration has been attained.

SylX5iwNV.content: LED-digits cannot handle negative numbers, so absolute value of Y is provided as input.

ByGpcoDVN.content: LED-digits cannot handle negative numbers, so absolute value of Z is provided as input.

HyhFssvNN.content: User-LED is the minus sign when the number displayed by LED-digits is negative.

B1-i0RuV4.content: Y and Z values are rounded to integers to avoid displaying negative zeros in the user interface.

@/example-4d-ulcd.description: Displays output from absolute orientation sensor on a 4D uLCD display.
